name: New Town New Me
description:
A choose-your-own adventure about leaving behind your past, making a new start and re-inventing yourself. You can complete the game in about a minute, but a thorough playthrough can take around 12 minutes. The whole game is roughly 7,500 words, and you won't see everything on one play through.

There are also a number of secrets to piece together.

REVIEWS:

"I like the way you can tell people to fuck off tbh"

- Haz

"..... cross porpoises.... crosS porpOises..... cROSS PORPOISES HOLY FUCK"

- Adelaide
